content.rendered: By the grace of Allah, we, OTAEN International Ltd.(A joint Venture Company of OTAE Bangladesh Ltd. and NAWSI International Ltd.) got a great opportunity for contributing ourselves & developing eletrical job of the national grid for Kushtia (Campus) and Moheshserpasha, Doulatpur, Khulna 2 No’s 33/11 KV 20/26.66 (MVA) GIS New substation on Turnkey Basis Expansion and Up-gradation of Power Distribution System Project.(EAUPDSP) It was a signing ceremony so it’s a great day for all of the OTAEN’s People.
